source:
%%sql
-- Build Employee_Dim table 

-- Notes - Addresses are only supplied for Inspectors - need to check inspector count against addresses data

-- INSERT OVERWRITE odw_harmonised_db.employee_dim (
--     EmployeeID,
--     FirstName,
--     LastName,
--     DOB,
--     NINumber,
--     Gender,
--     AddressLine1,
--     AddressLine2,
--     AddressLine3,
--     City,
--     County,
--     PostCode,
--     EmailAddress,
--     TelephoneNumberPersonal,
--     TelephoneNumberWork,
--     PersNumber,
--     EmployeeNumber,
--     FTE,
--     WorkHours,
--     PartTimeEmployee,
--     EmploymentStatus,
--     CivilServiceStart,
--     DateToCurrentJob,
--     SeniorityDate,
--     OrgStartDate,
--     FixTermEndDate,
--     LoanStartDate,
--     LoanEndDate,
--     PayrollArea,
--     AssignmentNumber,
--     EmployeeGroup,
--     AnnualSalary,
--     SourceSystemID,
--     StartDate,
--     EndDate,
--     IngestionDate,
--     ValidTo
-- )

SELECT 
    uuid(), --EmployeeID
    T1.First_name as FirstName,
    T1.Last_name as LastName,
    T1.Birth_date as DOB,
    T1.NI_number as NINumber,
    T1.Gender_Key as Gender,
    T2.Street_and_House_Number as AddressLine1,
    T2.`2nd_Address_Line` as AddressLine2,
    T2.District as AddressLine3,
    T2.City as City,
    T2.Region_State_Province_Count as County,
    T2.Postal_Code as PostCode,
    T3.Email_Address as EmailAddress,
    T2.Personal_Mobile as TelephoneNumberPersonal,
    T2.Work_Mobile as TelephoneNumberWork,
    T2.Staff_Number as PersNumber,
    T1.Pers_No as EmployeeNumber,
    T1.FTE,
    T1.Wk_hrs as WorkHours,
    T1.Indicator_Part_Time_Employee as PartTimeEmployee,
    T1.Employment_Status as EmploymentStatus,
    T1.Civil_Service_Start as CivilServiceStart,
    T1.Date_to_Current_Job as DateToCurrentJob,
    T1.Seniority_Date as SeniorityDate,
    T1.Org_Start_Date as OrgStartDate,
    T1.Fix_Term_End_Date as FixTermEndDate,
    T1.Loan_Start_Date as LoanStartDate,
    T1.Loan_End_Date as LoadEndDate,
    T1.Payroll_Area as PayrollArea,
    T1.Assignment_Number as AssignmentNumber,
    T1.Employee_Group as EmployeeGroup,
    T1.Annual_salary as AnnualSalary,
    T4.SourceSystemID,
    current_timestamp as StartDate,
    NULL as EndDate,
    current_timestamp as IngestDate,
    NULL as ValidTo,
    T1.expected_from,
    MEF.Max_expectedfrom

FROM odw_standardised_db.vw_saphr_historic T1
LEFT JOIN odw_standardised_db.vw_addresses T2 ON T1.Pers_No = T2.Staff_Number
LEFT JOIN odw_standardised_db.vw_email T3 ON T2.Staff_Number = T3.Staff_Number
LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.sourcesystem_fact T4 ON "SAP HR" = T4.Description
INNER JOIN (    SELECT MAX(expected_from) AS Max_expectedfrom FROM odw_standardised_db.vw_saphr_historic) MEF ON T1.expected_from = MEF.Max_expectedfrom
INNER JOIN (    SELECT Pers_No, MAX(report_monthend_date) AS Max_Rpt_Monthend_Date
                FROM odw_standardised_db.vw_saphr_historic
                Group by Pers_No) T2 ON T1.Pers_No = T2.Pers_No AND
                                        T1.report_monthend_date = T2.Max_Rpt_Monthend_Date

%%sql
SELECT 
    CASE 
        WHEN LENGTH(Pers_No) = 6 AND SUBSTR(Pers_No,1,1) = 5
        THEN CONCAT('00',Pers_No)
        WHEN LENGTH(Pers_No) = 6 AND SUBSTR(Pers_No,1,1) = 4
        THEN CONCAT('50',Pers_No)        
        ELSE Pers_No
    END as Pers_No,
    First_name,
    Last_name,
    Employee_No,
    CoCd,
    Company_Code,
    PA,
    Personnel_Area,
    PSubarea,
    Personnel_Subarea,
    Org_Unit,
    Organizational_Unit,
    Organizational_key,
    Organizational_key1,
    WorkC,
    Work_Contract,
    CT,
    Contract_Type,
    PS_Group,
    Pay_Band_Description,
    FTE,
    Wk_hrs,
    Indicator_Part_Time_Employee,
    S,
    Employment_Status,
    Gender_Key,
    TRA_Start_Date,
    TRA_End_Date,
    TRA_Status,
    TRA_Grade,
    Prev_PersNo,
    ActR,
    Reason_for_Action,
    Position,
    Position1,
    Cost_Ctr,
    Cost_Centre,
    Civil_Service_Start,
    Date_to_Current_Job,
    Seniority_Date,
    Date_to_Subst_Grade,
    Pers_No_1,
    Name_of_Manager_OM,
    Manager_Position,
    Manager_Position_Text,
    Counter_Sign_Manager,
    Loc,
    Location,
    Org_Start_Date,
    Fix_Term_End_Date,
    Loan_Start_Date,
    Loan_End_Date,
    EEGrp,
    Employee_Group,
    Annual_salary,
    Curr,
    NI_number,
    Birth_date,
    Age_of_employee,
    EO,
    Ethnic_origin,
    NID,
    Rel,
    Religious_Denomination_Key,
    SxO,
    Wage_Type,
    Employee_Subgroup,
    LOA_Abs_Type,
    LOA_Absence_Type_Text,
    Scheme_reference,
    Pension_Scheme_Name,
    Disability_Code,
    Disability_Text,
    Disability_Code_Description,
    PArea,
    Payroll_Area,
    Assignment_Number,
    FTE_2,
    ingested_datetime,
    expected_from,
    expected_to,
    report_monthend_date

FROM odw_standardised_db.sap_hr_historic
